text: Kokkarakko is an Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. K. Haridas, starring Vijayakumar, Dileep and Sudheesh in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Vijayakumar as Murali * Dileep as M. C. Prakashan * Sudheesh as Rameshan, a.k.a. Kunju * Prem Kumar as Radhakrishnan Vakeel * Rajan P. Dev as Gopalan Muthalali * Indrans as Vishalakshen * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Panchayat president * Harisree Ashokan as Narayanan, Worker Of Gopalan * Mala Aravindan as Tharathandi Achuthan Nair * Kanakalatha as Meenakshi, Wife of Achuthan Nair * Sadiq as Manu Krishna * Sudharani as Sandhya * Valsala Menon as Murali's mother * Gayathri as Vatsala Kunju's sister ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by K. K. Haridas
title: Kokkarakko
